local_intent: Perceive the goal outline, approach and align to it within tolerance, then verify arrival at the goal location.
assumptions: IsAt with target 'goal_T_outline' serves as verification of successful approach/alignment within the specified tolerance.
coherence_with_global: Implements the detect-then-ApproachAndAlign step preceding the final push in the GLOBAL_BT, using the same target and tolerance with retry semantics on detection.
